title: No health back on Red Buff smite

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I added the game history so if any summoners from the enemy team or my own or the lineups might have somehow something to do with it. once the replay is available on replay.gg shall link that too so you can see.

Last game I noticed (as I executed) that when I smote the Red buff from blue side that smiting it did not give the health refund. I tried again and the entire game it did not heal as it used to.

I haven't played jungle in a while so I can't tell for sure if this has been happening long, or it was a once off.

I couldn't find any information about the benefits of smiting jungle camps had been removed. I cannot say that the same is true with the blue buff mana restore as I did not smite blue buff.

Thank you for your time.

replies.body: Hey I'm keen to learn more about this and pass it on if possible. Please let me know when you've got the replay handy.
The game isn't showing up in Replay.gg :( I know it sometimes doesn't show all of them, had to choose not to show that one! Well, at least not yet, anyway.
Sorry dude. If you can find a way to reproduce, or better yet get a recording, let me know!
Makes me want to cry HAHA. Always the one replay you really want to watch again, isn't caught lol
